info.description: This is the backend API for the Music App, providing endpoints for authentication, music discovery, playlists, and user library management.
info.title: Music App Backend API

post.description: Authenticate or register a user using a Google ID token.
Authenticate a user with email and password to receive JWT tokens.
Obtain a new access token using a valid refresh token.
Register a new user with email, password, and display name.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of the authenticated user's favorite tracks.

post.description: Adds a track to the authenticated user's list of favorite tracks.

delete.description: Removes a track from the authenticated user's list of favorite tracks.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of the authenticated user's recently played tracks.

post.description: Adds a track to the authenticated user's listening history.

get.description: Searches for tracks by a query string, with optional filters.
Retrieves a paginated list of top tracks for a specific country.
Retrieves full details for a single track by its ID and provider.
Retrieves a paginated list of the authenticated user's playlists.

post.description: Creates a new playlist for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieves details for a single playlist. Can be accessed without authentication if the playlist is public.

patch.description: Updates a playlist's title, description, or public status.

post.description: Adds a single track to the end of a specified playlist.

delete.description: Removes a single track from a specified playlist.

get.description: Retrieves the full profile for the user associated with the JWT token.

patch.description: Updates the display name, photo URL, or preferences for the current user.

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
